content: idea for someone on your list give the textured crochet soap saver a try techniques you need to know to crochet this pattern include chain slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet and front post double_crochet what you ll need yarn yarn bee sugarwheel cotton in paris mornings or other dk weight cotton yarn crochet hook us size g 4 00mm notions yarn needle/tapestry needle scissors locking stitch marker
